{{also|datum|dátum}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|la|de}} {{m|la|datum}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈdaːtʊm/}} * {{audio|de|De-Datum.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Datum.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n||Daten}} # [[date]], [[datum]] # [[data]], a [[fact]], a piece of [[information]] about something ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s|pl=Daten}} =====Related terms===== * {{l|de|Datenbank|g=f}} * {{l|de|Datenschutz|g=m}} * {{l|de|Datenspeicher|g=m}} * {{l|de|Eckdaten|g=f}} * {{l|de|Messdaten|g=f}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Latin== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|la|grc|Δάτον}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{la-IPA|Datum}} ===Proper noun=== {{la-proper noun|Datum<2.loc>}} # A town of [[Macedonia]] famous for its [[goldmine]]s ====Declension==== {{la-ndecl|Datum<2.loc>}} ===References=== * {{R:Smith's Geography}} [[Category:la:Greece]] [[Category:la:Towns]]
